description.narrative: (Uganda): .This activity provides technical support to the National Tuberculosis and Leprosy Control Program (NTLP). It accelerates progress towards achieving national targets for TB case detection and treatment through: (1) enhancing leadership and technical capacity of NTLP to guide TB control efforts; (2) enabling the NTLP to implement innovative, directly-observed therapy short course interventions in Kampala; (3) improving coordination of TB and TB-HIV activities. It is a lead implementing mechanism that establishes the roll-out of programmatic management of multi-drug resistant TB in Uganda. This activity is also supported with PEPFAR funds......
